title: Aaradhana Polki & Ruby Haar
materials: Uncut Polki Diamonds (approx. 5 carats total weight)
features: A classic scalloped design featuring handcrafted polki diamonds set in a closed setting, interspersed with vibrant ruby accents. The intricate detailing showcases traditional Kundan craftsmanship with a modern minimalist twist. Each polki diamond is carefully selected for its unique shape and natural brilliance. The ruby settings add a touch of regal charm.
occasions: Half-Saree Function (Langa Voni Function). Perfect for adding a touch of heritage elegance to any modern attire.
description: Exquisite blend of traditional Kundan and Polki artistry. The use of natural rubies adds a pop of color and elevates the piece. The high-quality gold ensures durability and lasting shine. A timeless design that can be passed down through generations. Handcrafted in Hyderabad, the city of pearls and Nizams.
